metadata.title: CVE-2018-17233 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A SIGFPE signal is raised in the function H5D__create_chunk_file_map_hyper() of H5Dchunk.c in the HDF HDF5 through 1.10.3 library during an attempted parse of a crafted HDF file, because of incorrect protection against division by zero. It could allow a remote denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
